thread.section_title: Paper Divas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paper Divas | paperdivas.com.au
thread.title: Kathryn Perkins
thread.title_full: Paper Divas reviewed by Kathryn Perkins

author: Kathryn Perkins
title: Kathryn Perkins
text: I have ordered from Paper Divas a number of times now and every time they have provided a wonderful product and excellent service. I recently purchased some invitations. I submitted my order in the morning and received an email within a matter of hours on that same day to advise me the invitations had been shipped. I definitely recommend this company and will continue to use them.
